subsection.name: What Is James IMAP?
subsection.p: A library providing a flexible codec for IMAP, command processors and a sample data access layer. In combination with a socket layer, this library can be used to create an IMAP server.

subsection.name: What Is The Status Of James IMAP?
subsection.p: RFC2060 is functionally complete, tested and usable. However, the data access layer is considered unsatisfactory from design and performance perspectives. Database schema and API changes are expected.

subsection.name: Is IMAP Available In James?
subsection.p: JAMES Server 3 will support IMAP (using this library). A backport to JAMES Server 2.x would require a volunteer.
